hero.title: Full Stack Developer and Computer Engineering Student
hero.subtitle: Passionate about video game development and cybersecurity.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Computer Engineering student at the University of La Frontera, with a strong passion for learning and solving problems through technology. I currently excel as a Full Stack Developer. While I don’t have practical experience in video game development or cybersecurity yet, I am independently exploring these fields through courses, personal projects, and studying technical documentation.
about.high-ligt-content: I am a curious and dedicated learner. I enjoy working in teams, sharing ideas, and tackling technical challenges that help me grow as a professional.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here are some of the projects I’ve worked on.

pokedex.title: Pokedex
pokedex.description: A proof-of-concept (POC) mobile application that displays a list of Pokémon using the PokeAPI.

malwareLab.title: Malware Scanner
malwareLab.description: A malware scanner designed to identify and mitigate cyber threats using YARA Rules.

cityDashboard.title: City Scope Dashboard
cityDashboard.description: A dashboard for the ReplicaCity Temuco platform, visualizing real-time urban mobility data.

bunnyHunt.title: Bunny Hunt
bunnyHunt.description: A proof-of-concept video game developed using PhaserJS.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.content: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, job opportunities, or just a friendly chat.
contact.plataforms: You can find me on these platforms:
